channel.title: Counter-Strike Question
channel.description:
I just downloaded Counter-Strike, and i was really looking forward to playing it and i went to the servers tab. and it says this,
COULD NOT RETRIEVE MASTER GAME SERVER
and if i type in a server ip i go in the im quickly back out.
help?

item.title: Counter-Strike Question
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:355104”][quote author=c|p link=topic=451671.msg3310446#msg3310446 date=1281934867]

Do you have a valid key? Or did you download it with a torrent or something, if so you can only play on LAN servers (or with hamachi)

not true, there is an abundance of non-steam servers (http://css.setti.info/)
[/quote]

I wasn’t aware of that, it looks like it requires a patch though.[/quote]

it’s simple though, all you need to do is edit/replace the master servers file and make it read only.
and even then the master servers are just used to populate the server browser ingame, you can still connect to servers manually if you know the address

Read full topic

item.title: Counter-Strike Question

[/quote]

not true, there is an abundance of non-steam servers (http://css.setti.info/)[/quote]

I wasn’t aware of that, it looks like it requires a patch though.

item.title: Counter-Strike Question
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Frell:

Dont bother, the game is more of a joke than CoD.

are you kidding me? fy_iceworld, surf_skyworld and cs_italy blow every other fps out of the water.
